scripts.build: cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.dev: cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.develop: cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.now-build: cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
